vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Exo.6.23;
son of: Amminadab (H5992);
brother of: Elisheba (H0472);
father of: Salmon (H8007)
Also named: Naassōn<\i> (Ναασσών "Nahshon" G3476)
§ Nahshon = "enchanter"
son of Amminadab and prince of the Judah at the first numbering in the wilderness; 5th in descent from Judah in the genealogy of Christ
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Aminadab; jefe; tribu de Judá; en tiempos de Moisés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿順
1) 亞米拿達的兒子且是在曠野中以色列第一次數點男丁時猶大的族長;在基督的家譜中自猶大之後的第五代子孫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿顺
1) 亚米拿达的儿子且是在旷野中以色列第一次数点男丁时犹大的族长;在基督的家谱中自犹大之后的第五代子孙
